job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-30T04:19:13.000Z", "description": "

MZ Development (\u201cMZD\u201d) was founded in 2015 by assessment and technology experts with a shared vision for making performance assessment a reality for all. Since then, MZD\u2019s platforms (OSCAR, OSCAR Classroom and ADAM) have been used by forward looking K-12 school districts and leading testing organizations to enhance their assessment programs. Our clients expect us to deliver innovative EdTech solutions that make performance assessment a realistic option for them. 


Now we are looking to add to our talented engineering team. This position will be part of a virtual team of engineers who have a love for education and developing technology to improve it. Responsibilities include gathering user requirements, defining system functionality and writing code in various languages.


Ultimately, the role of the Software Engineer is to build high-quality, innovative and fully performing software that complies with coding standards and technical design.


Responsibilities


This position reports to the CTO and will have responsibility for new product development and support.


Responsibilities include:

\u00b7     Execute full software development life cycle (SDLC)

\u00b7     Write well-designed, testable code

\u00b7     Produce specifications and determine operational feasibility

\u00b7     Integrate software components into a fully functional software system

\u00b7     Develop software verification plans and quality assurance procedures

\u00b7     Document and maintain software functionality

\u00b7     Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems

\u00b7     Deploy programs and evaluate user feedback

\u00b7     Comply with project plans and industry standards

\u00b7     Ensure software is updated with latest features


Required Skills and Experience


\u00b7     BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant experience

\u00b7     Proven work experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer (2-4 years)

\u00b7     Experience with web development (2-4) years

\u00b7     Familiarity with AWS hosted applications

\u00b7     Experience using Go, Vue, Python, TensorFlow or MongoDB (desired)

\u00b7     Experience with test-driven development

\u00b7     Proficiency in software engineering tools

\u00b7     Ability to document requirements and specifications

\u00b7     Ability and desire to work as part of a virtual

\u00b7     Experience with GIT or similar VCS tools
